subject: Adderall (Drug)
Football
Tests (Drug Use)
Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder
Drugs (Pharmaceuticals)
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: According to N.F.L. figures, there have been 21 suspensions this calendar year because of failed tests for performance-enhancing drugs, including amphetamines like Adderall.
snippet: According to N.F.L. figures, there have been 21 suspensions this calendar year because of failed tests for performance-enhancing drugs, including amphetamines like Adderall.
